name: Courtyard by Marriott by Marriott Philadelphia Montgomeryville

reviews.text: I've stayed at this courtyard many times for busienss, and the experience is mixed. Since Marriott has gone all none smoking, some of the rooms that used to be smoking rooms were converted to non-smoking room. I happened to get one of those rooms a few times, and I didn't think their cleaning process was perfect because I could still smell years of smoking in those rooms.
reviews.title: Average Courtyard Hotel

likes.disliked: — Sometimes you can get what used to be a smoking room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Some of the front desk personnel weren't very professional, while others are very good.
reviews.title: Loved It

reviews.text: The room is always kept clean, and I'm always pleased with that aspect of this property. I also noticed during my most recent stay that they have improved the toiletry supply.
reviews.title: Good Courtyard Service

aka: Courtyard By Marriott By Marriott Philadelphia Montgomeryville Hotel
